metadata.name: Eternal Waiting
metadata.description: When you grow up, you lose touch with your inner child, and you can't remember the last time you felt truly happy or carefree. When you feel lost and disconnected from yourself, you go to a nearby beach and sit on a bench by the water. You hope that the endless horizon will help you remember things from your childhood. You sit there for hours, watching the waves crash against the shore, lost in thought. Suddenly, an opportunity presents itself, and memories of playing with your friends in the rain flood back to you: splashing in puddles and feeling the water soak through your clothes. Your heart lifted as you remembered the feeling of freedom and pure joy you had experienced in that moment. You stood up and decided that you wouldn't wait any longer to reconnect with your inner child. And so your journey began! You started going on adventures, trying new hobbies, and embracing spontaneity. With each new experience, your inner child came back to life; that would end this Eternal Waiting!
